# AidedCAM

> Custom CAD/CAM/CNC automation software for manufacturing companies.
> Autodesk Authorized Developer. Based in Greece (Athens, Thessaloniki).
> Serves companies in Greece, Belgium, Switzerland, Austria, Germany.

## Services
- Single Project: Automation of one specific CAD/CAM task or workflow
- Whole Workflow: End-to-end production workflow automation (from design to manufacturing)
- Workflow + Continuous Support: Full automation with ongoing monitoring, improvements, and bug fixes

## Supported Software
- Autodesk PowerMill (CAM)
- Autodesk PowerShape (CAD)
- Autodesk FeatureCAM (CAM)
- Autodesk Inventor (CAD)
- TopSolid (coming soon)
- Standalone solutions via DevDept (no third-party CAD/CAM required)

## Process
1. Workflow analysis - map every production step
2. Solution design - decide what to automate and how
3. Tool development - build custom software
4. Integration and testing - install and fine-tune
5. Training and support - onboard the team

## Key Facts
- Up to 70% reduction in production preparation time
- Active in 5+ countries
- 100% custom-built solutions
- Zero dependency on individual operators
